review: While the Roku stick seems to work well enough, I am trying to get my 3rd remote as the other 2 I had quit working shortly after I received them.  Customer service is not great and I have to sit on the phone FOREVER waiting to talk to someone. When I get someone they have had a heavy foreign accent and are difficult to understand.  While I can access Ruko thru my phone it is not always convenient. No problems with chromecast. So frustrating. Still on hold after 25 minutes.

author: Mollie

review: Love the roku overall but the remote I got stops working after a few minutes. (Taking battery out and outing it back in briefly gets it working again.) The phone app remote works reliably, but it's way less convenient than the remote on the coffee table, and not something my dad can quickly pull up.Calls to support proved useless, and I know other people whose reviews died. Wish they stuck with a simple, dependable IR remote if they can't get the WiFi remotes to work well.
